attributes.action: The Uk should join the Schengen agreememt
attributes.additional_details:
Sorry if i'm a touch drunk, but i believe that most British prople agree with me. 

The best information on Schengen can be found on wikipedia at https://en.m.wikipedia.org/wiki/Schengen_Area and more information can be seen athttps://ec.europa.eu/home-affairs/what-we-do/policies/borders-and-visas/schengen_en
attributes.background: The Schengen Agreement allows people to move around Europe, and the UK is unfortunately not part of it. I believe that British people should have the right to live and work where they would like, and that, in return, Europeans should have the right to live and work here too.
